DOC.brief_title: B195 : Effect Diet-Induced Energy Deficit Body Fat Reduction Inflammatory Markers Obese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Previous epidemiological study associate elevated level acute phase protein , mainly C-reactive protein , cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) cardiac death . Levels several cy-tokines acute phase proteins CRP , haptoglobin fibrinogen find associate elevated body fat risk disease associate metabolic syndrome . Method : Thirty-six otherwise healthy obese subject ( BMI : 34.23.2 kg/m2 , age : 43.410.5 ) participate 20-week controlled dietary intervention divide 4 period . Weight reduction induce 8-week low caloric diet ( LCD ) ( 3.4 MJ/d ) follow 4-week weight stable maintenance program ( M1 ) . Subsequently , underwent another 4-week LCD ( 4.2 MJ/d ) follow final 4-week weight stable maintenance diet ( M2 ) . Blood sample anthropometrical measure assess baseline four period ( 8 , 12 , 16 20 week ) .
